plot: After Molly collapses and experiences a vision of her encounter on the Seraphim, Sam agrees to give her an ultrasound so she can learn more about her mysterious pregnancy. Also, Molly tracks down Kryger and he reveals the disturbing details of his own solo mission that the International Space Exploration Agency (ISEA) is keeping secret.—Jiilo_Kim

Molly collapses at home but not before again seeing her dead boyfriend Marcus Dawkins. Molly tells Sam Barton that Harmon Kryger is still alive and learns that she has the same brain scan abnormalities as he did. Molly meets him and he describes what he saw during his tour on the station. His conclusion is that he and Molly were being experimented on by the ISEA. Molly has an ultrasound. Meanwhile, John has his first day at the ultra-modern lab facilities provided by Hideki Yasumoto.—garykmcd
